thread.title: This mum's well-meaning WhatsApp fail may be the greatest of all time
thread.title_full: This mum's well-meaning WhatsApp fail may be the greatest of all time

author: Sam Haysom
title: This mum's well-meaning WhatsApp fail may be the greatest of all time
text:
When you're getting to grips with new technology or testing out a freshly downloaded app, mistakes can happen.
No one knows this better than anyone who's ever received a bungled attempt at communication from a parent or a grandparent.
And if there's one thing communities such as r/oldpeoplefacebook have taught us, it's that these glorious moments need to be documented and shared for all to enjoy.
SEE ALSO: This Irish mum's Whatsapp group opener may be the greatest of all time
On Wednesday, Twitter user @conrad1798 posted the following, glorious screengrab of his mum's attempt to send him a WhatsApp message.
Mum hasn't got the hang of whatsapp ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ pic.twitter.com/c7m8Y4lx9c

To be fair, she still managed to get the message across.
There was a happy ending, too â€” it turned out Conrad did have his keys after all.
